mapper.select: select main_code, call_order, call_user, call_num, biz_id, template_json, call_status, call_time, result_detail, result_time, create_time, modify_time from s_b_call_detail where main_code = #{mainCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and call_status = #{callResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY call_order LIMIT 1
mapper.insert:
insert into s_b_call_detail (main_code, call_order, call_user, call_num, biz_id, template_json, call_status, call_time, result_detail, result_time, create_time, modify_time ) values
(#{item.mainCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.callUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.templateJson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.resultDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resultTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
